message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $180. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm on a budget.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your budget constraints, but $60 is too low.  Could you meet me halfway at $120?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $120 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $90. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to compromise.
